title: Drawing, "Sketches from the Valley el Yemen, Arabia", February 20, 1868
medium:
Recto: Graphite on gray paper
Verso: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, at upper left: El Yemen

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at various locations:  Light / w[hite] / brown / Rich / white grey; and at lower right: El Yemen
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of a rock wall

Verso:  Horizontal rough sketch of details of a rock wall

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from the Valley el Yemen, Arabia", February 20, 1868.
February 20, 1868. Recto: Graphite on gray paper
Verso: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-176.
